unnormalised: Okay bhavam, maka hanv just Indieantlean ekdom pagel ashi trainichi journey korun ailo ani maka tumche kodden sangpakuch podtalle. Hanv proper backpacking tripache vixayant ulaitam, Indian Railwayanchear 2000+ kms cover korun. Udpaan udonak vochanastanam, trainintlean bhonvddeak vochpacho kharo deal tumka hea deshk dekhpak zai zalear!
normalised: Okay mhunnle bhurgeyancho, mhaka bhartantlean ekdom bhiranticho relve provash korun ailo ani mhaka tatuntleo vostu vanttpacheo poddtta. Hanv ek proper backpacking tripacher uloytam, zantunt don hazar plus kilometer Indian Railwayacher asa. Uddupak visrun voch, relve provash khorea rupant asa tumak hi dhes dista zalear!

unnormalised: Poileak poilem, ticket book korop. Hanv Rajdhani-nt 1AC ticket book korun fancy zavpak sodtalom, punn seriously, ₹5000+ thoḍi chodd mand zavta tumi budget-acher astanam. Sleeper class-ak gheun gelom. Ani sachin sangtam, sleeper class-anuch magic ghoddta! Te mhonnlear, Delhi than Mumbai ₹800 zata, ekdom barobar asa.
normalised: Poile svota, ticket book korop. Hanv ekdom fancy zaunk ani Rajdhani-cher ek one A-C ticket book korunk prayatn kelo, punn seriously, rupaya panch hazar plus thodde unne asat jevha tum ek budgetacher astan. Sleeper class-an gele. Ani khoreponnan, sleeper class mhunnlear jadu zatam! Tem rupaya atth sho Delhi-than Mumbai-k asa, purn rupan molachem.

unnormalised: Maka 2/08/2024 thavn mazi trip mukhar dhukli kiteak maka favo zalear mazo ixtt tednam freen nastalo. New Delhi Railway Station-than 6:00 PM-ak suru kelem. Utrabalidai ekdom bhirantichi asta! Lok dhunvolltai, chai wallah randtai, samosheacho vas... ekdom bhaukit bhurgeache zata. Punn borem bhaxen, tuvem zanna?
normalised: Hanven mhazo provash dusrea August don hazar ani chovis-tan preponed kelo karonn mhazo ixtt ten'na fukot naslo. Nava Delhi Railway Station-acher sanjechea so vazta suru kelo. Ekech vellar ekdom nirdai! Lok dhampa-dhampi kortat, chai wallah kallzom kortat, samosacho vas…tem ek sensory overload asa. Punn ek bore ritin, tum zannat?

unnormalised: Mazi poili train Paschim Express Jaipur-ak asli. 4 hrs-an paulo. Rajasthan sundor asa, bhav! Sogllem ekdom rongit asa. Uprant Golden Temple Mail Jaipur than Amritsar-ak geli. Hanv Amritsar-ak 05/08/2024-ak 10:00 AM-ak paulo.
normalised: Mazi poili relve Paschim Express-tan Jaipur-ak geli. Char horanim paunchlo. Rajasthan sundar asa, monis! Sogllem ekdom rangit asa. Magir Golden Temple Mail Jaipur-than Amritsar-ak gelo. Hanv Amritsar-ak panchve August don hazar ani chovis-ak sokallchea dha vazta paunchlo.

unnormalised: Indiantlean trainichea bhonvddekhatir ut'tom bhag konn? Jeunn! Railway cateringache chodd molle visrun vocha. Tuka randomly stations-ancher utrun sthanik delicacy try korop poddta. Hanv Tundla Junction-an aloo tikki khali (seriously, Tundla Junction!), Punjab-an ut'tom lassi khali, ani MP-nt kitei questionable punn ruchik biryani khali.
normalised: Bhartantle relve provasant ut'tom bhag kitem? Jeunn! Moladik relve jevnn visrun voch. Tumank random station-ancher denvonk zai ani sthanik jeunnachi ruch gheunk zai. Hanvem aloo tikki Tundla Junction-acher khal'li (seriously, Tundla Junction!), Punjab-ant ut'tom lassi, ani kashtta-kasttan punn ruchiche biryani M-P-nt kiteak tori khal'li.

unnormalised: Ani lok! Hanv Diwali-khatir ghara vochpi vidyarthik bhettolo (zo 01/11 hea vorsak asa), retired army man jannem maka zhuzacheo khobro sangleo, ani ek puro ghar Kerala-k lagna khatir vochot aslo. Soglle ekdom ixttagi ani aplem katha sangpak toyar asat. Tumchi bag surakshit dovrat!
normalised: Ani lok! Mhaka Diwali-k ghora vot'ta astana ek vidhyarthi mell'llo (zo poilea November-ak asa hea vorsak!), ek retired army monis, zannem mhaka yudhachi khobram sangleo, ani ekechea gharachea Kerala-k ek lognak yetale. Soglle zannaicho zannacho zavnko utsuk astole. Fuddaracho rakhop kor!

unnormalised: Hanv ek vostu shikhli ti mhonnlear toilet paper gheun vochpacho asta. Ani hand sanitizer. Seriously. Tum maka uprant dhanyavad ditole. Ani tumchea phonak kitei movies download karat kiteak kiteak wifi holiday-k vochpak tharaita. Hanv ek 20000 mAH power bank-ui ghetlem. Ekdom upayukt!
normalised: Ek vostu hanvem shikli ti mhunnlear toilet paper gheun voch. Ani hand sanitizer. Seriously. Tum mhaka upkar manntelim. Ani tumchea phonak thodde film download korat karonn kiteak tori wi-fi sutti gheta. Hanvem don lakh m-A-H power bank ghetlo. Super upyogi!

unnormalised: Kiteak tumi khari adventure sodtat zalear, flights-ak dukhani marat ani trainin vochat. Ti utrabalidai, ti gandit, ti kiteak tori trasachi asa, punn tem khari Indiak onubhavpak ut'tom marg asa. IRCTC-ant ticket mukharuch book karat, unne vostu ghalat, ani bhonvddek toyar ravat! Purn bhonvddekhatir puro kharcho ₹15000 aslo, jeunn ani sogllek dharun. Bargain!
normalised: Kitem tori zav, tum ek khoreponnachem adventure sodtal zalear, uddeunk visrun voch ani relve gheun voch. Tem chaotic asa, tem dushtem asta, tem kiteak tori kashtta-kasttachem asta, punn tem khorea Bhartak anubhavpachea ut'tom ritin asa. Fuddem tumchem ticket I-R-C-T-C-nt book korat, thodde vostu bhara korat, ani ek ride-ache khatir toyar rav! Provashache uddeonak rupaya pondra hazar kharch kelo, jevnn mellovun sogllek. Bargain!
